item.title: Video editing with ffmpeg and kdenlive
item.description: Having recently bought a brand new Sony Action Cam HDR-AS200v I wanted to do some video editing. I’ve used Blender before but at some point of time it was to over-bloated and to complicated for some video editing tasks. So I’ve had a look at kdenlive. Due to the nature of the action cam I had recordings in standard MP4 (28 Mb/s) XAVC S Codec (50 Mb/s) I’ve first set the right profile in kdenlive (1080p, 30fps) and imported the recordings.
